      Defines the base cost of the action.
      (package private) float GoapAction.generateCost(IGoapUnit goapUnit)
      This function will be called for each GoapAction in the generation of each Graph to determine the cost for each node in the graph.

      Checks if the current action of the GoapAction Queue is finished.

      Function to determine if the unit is in a certain range.

      Gets called when the action is going to be executed by the Unit.

      Function for planning an GoapAction Queue.
      java.util.Queue<GoapAction> GoapPlanner.plan(IGoapUnit goapUnit)
      Generate a plan (Queue of GoapActions) which is then performed by the assigned GoapUnit.
      protected abstract boolean GoapAction.requiresInRange(IGoapUnit goapUnit)
      Defines if the unit needs to be in a certain range in relation to the target to execute the action.
      boolean RunActionState.runGoapAction(IGoapUnit goapUnit)
      Cycle trough all actions until an invalid one or the end of the Queue is reached.
      boolean MoveToState.runGoapAction(IGoapUnit goapUnit)
      Move to the target of the currentAction until the unit is in range to perform the action itself.
      boolean IFSMState.runGoapAction(IGoapUnit goapUnit)
      Returning false results in the removing of the implementers instance on the stack of the FSM.
